javax.media.protocol
Interface Controls

All Known Subinterfaces:
PullBufferStream, PullSourceStream, PushBufferStream, PushSourceStream, SourceStream
All Known Implementing Classes:
DataSource
public interface Controls
extends Controls

It extends javax.media.Controls. It doesn't add any new functionalities to its super class. But it's here to maintain compatibility with JMF 1.0

Methods inherited from interface javax.media.Controls
getControl, getControls
